title: Radisson Announces The Opening Of Newest Hotel In DallasTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Radisson announced its new property in Dallas open for visitors Published on : Tuesday, July 7, 2015
Radisson, one of the best-recognized hotel brands, announced the opening of the Radisson Hotel Dallas North-Addison. Located at 4960 Arapaho Road, Addison TX, the hotel offers 101 guestrooms and meeting facilities.
“This hotel is the perfect complement to our recently refreshed Radisson portfolio of hotels in the Americas.” said Javier Rosenberg, chief operating officer, Carlson Rezidor Hotel Group, Americas. “Guests of the hotel can look forward to experiencing the Radisson ‘Yes I Can!’ philosophy delivering excellent service, comfort and style.”
On-site amenities at the hotel include a completely refreshed restaurant, state-of-the-art fitness center and outdoor pool, as well as a business center, and access to free high-speed Internet. The public spaces have been redesigned and renovated to provide a modern atmosphere with new furnishings, flooring and lightning and the guest rooms have undergone a refresh as well.
“We are extremely pleased to welcome guests to the Radisson Hotel Dallas North-Addison,” said general manager Christopher Dennis. “The Radisson brand is known for providing an elevated level of service and we look forward to delivering this to our guests.”
The hotel is conveniently located off the North Dallas Tollway offering easy access to top local attractions including the Galleria Mall, Addison Circle Park and more than 170 restaurants within a two mile radius. Guests can also enjoy complimentary shuttle service to Addison Airport and other destinations within five miles of the hotel.
As one of the most refreshed hotel brands in North America, Radisson recently completed a brand-wide renovation of more than 150 hotels in the Americas. Together with its franchise partners, Radisson has invested more than $600 million over the past 5 years into refreshing its portfolio. The hotels feature distinct lobbies, inviting guest rooms and suites, along with contemporary event spaces, boldly designed bars and restaurants. The uniquely designed hotels differ in style from location to location and reflect the local area and personality of the hotel.
Source:- Carlson Rezidor
